code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{CalendarIcon,LayoutGridIcon,ClockIcon}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MainView=()=>{const[view,setView]=useState('day');const renderContent=()=>{switch(view){case'day':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center text-xl mt-6",children:"\u0414\u043D\u0435\u0432\u043D\u043E\u0439 \u0440\u0435\u0436\u0438\u043C \uD83D\uDCC5"});case'week':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center text-xl mt-6",children:"\u041D\u0435\u0434\u0435\u043B\u044C\u043D\u044B\u0439 \u0440\u0435\u0436\u0438\u043C \uD83D\uDCC6"});case'month':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center text-xl mt-6",children:"\u041C\u0435\u0441\u044F\u0447\u043D\u044B\u0439 \u0440\u0435\u0436\u0438\u043C \uD83D\uDDD3\uFE0F"});default:return null;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4 min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-b from-indigo-50 to-white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-center mb-6",children:"\uD83D\uDCD4 \u041A\u0430\u043B\u0435\u043D\u0434\u0430\u0440\u044C \u0437\u0430\u0434\u0430\u0447"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-center gap-4 mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Button,{variant:view==='day'?'default':'outline',onClick:()=>setView('day'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ClockIcon,{className:"w-4 h-4 mr-2"})," \u0414\u0435\u043D\u044C"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Button,{variant:view==='week'?'default':'outline',onClick:()=>setView('week'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LayoutGridIcon,{className:"w-4 h-4 mr-2"})," \u041D\u0435\u0434\u0435\u043B\u044F"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Button,{variant:view==='month'?'default':'outline',onClick:()=>setView('month'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CalendarIcon,{className:"w-4 h-4 mr-2"})," \u041C\u0435\u0441\u044F\u0446"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rounded-xl p-6 shadow-md bg-white",children:renderContent()})]});};export default MainView;
